description.long: You summon a swarm of stinging insects to harass your foe causing Light Lethal damage over time and reducing both their movement speed and defense.  This power has a moderate chance at granting your pets a stack of Pack Mentality.  Damage: Light DoT, Recharge: Very Fast

description.short: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT(Lethal), Foe -Speed, +1 Blood Frenzy
description.long: You execute a savage slash at your foe's lower body causing moderate lethal damage and minor damage over time. The foe will also have their movement speed reduced moderately. Maiming Slash grants 1 stack of Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Fast

description.short: Melee, High DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), Knockdown, Self +2 Blood Frenzy
description.long: You tear at your foe with both hands dealing high lethal damage and causing minor lethal damage over time. Foes struck by this attack have a high chance to be knocked down. Vicious Slash grants 2 stacks of Blood Frenzy.  Damage: High, Minor DoT, Recharge: Moderate

With a mighty roar, you command an unkindness of ravens to quickly assault and harass your foes. Your foes will suffer Moderate Lethal damage over time and have their speed and defense reduced. This power inflicts lethal damage over time that scales in strength with the number of Blood Frenzy stacks. This power grants 2 stacks of Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Moderate

You tap into your core senses and attempt to spot vulnerable prey. Your chance to hit and damage are both increased for a few seconds. Your perception is greatly increased for a longer amount of time. Recharge: Long

description.short: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), -Blood Frenzy
description.long: You wildly slash at nearby foes to deal moderate lethal damage and cause minor lethal damage over time. This power consumes all Blood Frenzy and will deal additional damage per stack of Blood Frenzy consumed. If you have 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy while activating this power, its radius is greatly increased, but causes you to become Exhausted for a short time. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Long
Through perfect control of your body, you can concentrate for a few moments and heal yourself. The effects of Reconstruction also leaves you resistant to Toxic damage for a while. Recharge: Long

description.short: Ranged, High DMG (Lethal), Special DoT, Foe -To Hit, Knockdown, -Fly
description.long: You call forth a hawk ally to swoop in and viciously peck at your target causing High Lethal damage. The attack often catches foes off their guard and can knock them down as well as reducing their chance to hit. This power's damage over time effect will scale with the number of Blood Frenzy stacks. Using this power with 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy cause you to become Exhausted for a short time, but the duration of its damage over time effect is increased. Damage: High, Special DoT, Recharge: Slow

description.short: High DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), +Blood Frenzy, Self Teleport
description.long: You throw yourself at your target while slashing and tearing wildly dealing moderate lethal damage and it foes to suffer from additional minor lethal damage over time. The damage of this power can increase based on how far away you charge from,  with up to double damage dealt at its strongest. Feral Charge builds 1 stack of Blood Frenzy for every 20 ft in between your target and you, up to 3 stacks. Damage: High, Minor DoT, Recharge: Long
